app_name.message: TabTabTab - All In One Tab Manager
app_name.description: The name of the application. Shown in the web store.

app_name_short.description: The short name of the application. Shown at the top of the dropdown menu.

app_desc.message: Diese Erweiterung unterstützt Sie beim Surfen, indem sie die Verwaltung der Tabs verbessert.
app_desc.description: The short description of the application. Shown in the web store.

window.description: Used as a heading for window tabs in the popup. For example, it is used as 'Window1', 'Window2', etc.

current_window.description: Used as a heading within the popup to indicate the current window in the window tabs section.

pinned.description: Used as a heading for grouping and displaying pinned tabs together.

month.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '1 month ago'.

months.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '2 months ago'.

day.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '1 day ago'.

days.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '2 days ago'.

hour.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '1 hour ago'.

hours.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '2 hours ago'.

min.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '1 min ago'.

mins.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '2 mins ago'.

sec.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '1 sec ago'.

secs.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '2 secs ago'.

ago.description: Used to display the elapsed time since the tab was last active, for example, '2 mins ago'.

search_tabs.description: Displayed as a placeholder in the tab search form.

no_results_found.description: Displayed when no results are found during a tab search.

recent_active_tabs_header.description: Recently active tab headings to display in search results

copy_url.description: Displayed within the action menu for tabs.

pin.description: Displayed within the action menu for tabs.

unpin.description: Displayed within the action menu for tabs.

add_to_new_group.description: Displayed within the action menu for tabs.

remove_from_group.description: Displayed within the action menu for tabs.

screenshot_visible_area.description: Displayed within the action menu for highlighted tab.

ungroup.description: Displayed within the action menu for tab group.

close_group.description: Displayed within the action menu for tab group.

unpin_all.description: Displayed within the action menu for pinned.

close_all.description: Displayed within the action menu for pinned.

duplicated.description: Displayed next to the tab title if the same tab exists across the entire window.

resolve_duplicates.description: Text displayed on hover over the duplicate chip next to the tab, an action to resolve duplicate tabs.

tab_cleaner_header.description: Heading for the feature that automatically close tabs that have not been used for a set period of time.

tab_cleaner_description.message: Wenn Sie diese Einstellung aktivieren, werden die Tabs automatisch geschlossen, sobald die eingestellte Zeitspanne seit ihrer letzten Aktivierung verstrichen ist.
tab_cleaner_description.description: Description for the feature that automatically closes tabs that have not been used for a specified period of time.

duration.description: Heading for the input form to set the duration for automatically closing tabs that have been inactive for a specified period.

unit.description: Heading for the unit input form used in the feature for automatically closing tabs after a specified period of inactivity.

duration_unit_day.description: One of the selectable units for the duration in the feature that automatically closes tabs after a specified period of inactivity.

duration_unit_hour.description: One of the selectable units for the duration in the feature that automatically closes tabs after a specified period of inactivity.

popup_size_header.description: Heading for the popup size settings.

popup_size_description.description: Notes or cautionary advice regarding the settings for the popup size.

popup_element_scale_header.description: Heading for the settings to adjust the scale of elements within the popup.

popup_element_scale_description.message: Passen Sie die Größe von Elementen wie Schriften und Symbolen im Popup zwischen 50~150% ihrer Standardgröße an.
popup_element_scale_description.description: Notes or cautionary advice regarding the settings for scaling elements within the popup.

popup_element_scale_validation_error_val.description: Error message displayed for validation issues in the settings for scaling elements within the popup.

popup_element_scale_validation_error_val.message: Geben Sie einen Wert im Bereich von 50 bis 150 ein.
popup_element_scale_validation_error_val.description: Error message displayed for validation issues in the settings for scaling elements within the popup.

scale.description: Heading for the input form to adjust the scale of elements within the popup.

height.description: Heading for the height input form in the popup size settings.

width.description: Heading for the width input form in the popup size settings.

save.description: Text for the save button in the settings form.

saving.description: Text displayed on the save button in the settings form when saving is in progress.

saved_successfully.description: Message displayed in a toast notification when settings are successfully saved in the settings form.

saved_error.message: Die Einstellung konnte nicht gespeichert werden. Bitte versuchen Sie es erneut.
saved_error.description: Message displayed in a toast notification when settings fail to save in the settings form.

popup_size_validation_error_value_format.description: Error message displayed for validation issues in the popup size settings.

popup_size_validation_error_value_range.message: Die Höhe sollte auf einen Wert zwischen 200 und 600 und die Breite auf einen Wert zwischen 400 und 800 eingestellt werden.
popup_size_validation_error_value_range.description: Error message displayed for validation issues in the popup size settings.

tab_cleaner_validation_error_value_forma.description: Error message displayed for validation issues in the feature that automatically closes tabs after a specified period of inactivity.

tab_cleaner_error_on_save.description: Message displayed when an error occurs while saving the settings for the feature that automatically closes tabs after a specified period of inactivity.

bug_report_and_feature_request_title.description: Heading for the section covering bug reports and feature requests.

bug_report_and_feature_request_descripti.message: Wenn Sie bei der Verwendung von TabTabTab auf Fehler stoßen oder Vorschläge für neue Funktionen haben, können Sie einen Eintrag auf GitHub erstellen.
bug_report_and_feature_request_descripti.description: Description for the section dedicated to submitting bug reports and feature requests.

store_review_title.description: Heading for the store reviews section.

store_review_description.message: Wenn Sie TabTabTab hilfreich finden, würden wir uns sehr freuen, wenn Sie uns eine Bewertung im Chrome WebStore hinterlassen würden! Ihre Stimme trägt wesentlich zur Entwicklung von TabTabTab bei.
store_review_description.description: Description for the section regarding store reviews.

source_code_title.description: Heading for the source code section.

source_code_description.message: Der Code für TabTabTab ist quelloffen und öffentlich zugänglich. Er wird sorgfältig verwaltet, um jegliche unerlaubte Programmierung zu verhindern und sicherzustellen, dass die Erweiterung sicher entwickelt wird.
source_code_description.description: Description for the section related to the source code.
